keyword: how many calories in a sleeve of ritz crackers
title: How Many Calories in a Sleeve of Ritz Crackers?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in a sleeve of Ritz crackers, with full nutrition facts, macros per serving, and easy tweaks for different flavors.
h1: How Many Calories in a Sleeve of Ritz Crackers?
assumptions: Original flavor Ritz crackers; one standard sleeve (approx. 35 crackers, 120g total weight).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, exact sleeve size, and manufacturer. Values are averages; check packaging for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A sleeve of Ritz crackers provides about 500 calories, primarily from refined carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in one sleeve of Ritz crackers?
faqs.a: Approximately 500 calories for a standard original sleeve.

faqs.q: How many crackers are in a sleeve of Ritz?
What are the carbs in a sleeve of Ritz crackers?
faqs.a: About 65g total carbs, with 2g fiber and 5g sugars.

faqs.q: Are Ritz crackers high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, a sleeve has around 1000mg sodiumâ€”watch intake if limiting salt.

faqs.q: How does the calorie count change with flavored Ritz?
faqs.a: Flavored varieties like cheese may add 50-100 calories per sleeve due to extra fat.
